long_description: Look out, a tidal wave of colorific fun is coming at ya. The athletic girls' Roxy T-Back One-Piece Swimsuit is made from an extra-strong and incredibly resilient nylon/spandex blend. Super swim fabric is smooth to the touch and will protect her skin from rashing. You can count on the Roxy T-Back One-Piece Swimsuit colors to stay nice and bright even after several seasons in the surf and sun. Hand wash cold.
short_description: Look out, a tidal wave of colorific fun is coming at ya. The athletic girls' Roxy T-Back One-Piece Swimsuit is made from an extra-strong and incredibly resilient nylon/spandex blend.
